__e: The great whore of Babylon with seven heads is here among us. She tries to cheat us with her lies.
I had a few days' leave coming and Babylon 5 is easier to visit than Brakir so I came to learn.
The Babylon Project was our last, best hope for peace.
It could be a dangerous place but we accepted the risk because Babylon 5 was our last, best hope for peace.
The Babylon Project was our last, best hope for peace.
